title: Inside Meta’s pivot from open source to money-making AI model

title: AI leaders warn of “catastrophic outcomes” as artificial general intelligence looms
description: Artificial general intelligence (AGI) could arrive within a decade, bringing catastrophic outcomes like cyberattacks, autonomous weapons and existential threats to humanity, warns Google DeepMind CEO Demis Hassabis. Artificial intelligence (AI) is already being weaponized for cyberattacks on critical infrastructure (e.g., energy, water systems), deepfake disinformation, fraud and job displacement, with FBI warnings about AI-generated scams […]

title: Expansion Beyond Crypto Into AI Accelerates with QVAC Health App

content:

title: Amazon to invest over $35 billion in India on AI, exports
description: AMAZON plans to invest more than $35 billion in India by 2030 to expand its operations by boosting artificial intelligence (AI) capabilities and increasing exports, the United States e-commerce giant said on Wednesday, as global tech firms deepen their presence in Asia’s third-largest economy.

title: A multimodal AI model may improve recurrence risk stratification in early breast cancer
description: An artificial intelligence (AI) model created by integrating clinical, molecular, and histopathological data significantly improved recurrence risk stratification in hormone receptor (HR)-positive, HER2-negative breast cancer, according to results presented at the San Antonio Breast Cancer Symposium (SABCS), held December 9–12, 2025.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Tamil Nadu's Vision: Democratizing AI for All
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact.
